data.actual_result: The "Invite People" option does not show up
data.expected_result: The "Invite People" option shows up at the top of the menu
data.short_description: Unable to right click and invite people to a server
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you can create invites but can't invite to the top channel - Right click on the server icon - Look for the "Invite People" option on the menu
